document_data.name: Jereth Ardruth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Jereth Ardruth''' was a [[War Wizard]], contemporary of either [[Palaghard Obarskyr I]] or [[Palaghard Obarskyr II]] in their youths.

{{Quote|''If you need to hide, Druthâ€™s pillar swings wide.''|Missive from young [[Palaghard]] to a playpretty, 12th or 13th century}}
document_data.Possessions: They were assigned a closet that terminated at a triple pillar.
document_data.History: Jereth Ardruth had been used as a landmark by one of the Palaghards.
